issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
After installing the latest Studio update I receive an error message whenever I open a project file (javascript, xml, tss, etc.)

fields.summary: Analytics error when opening project file in Appcelerator Studio
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.3

Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.0.1.201506021908
Build: jenkins-appcelerator-rcp-master-312 (origin/master)
Date: 02 June 2015, 19:10:05

comments.body:
Logged out. Tried logging back in but got stuck at "signing in."

Uninstall + reinstall was required to get things working again.

Hello,

Tested this issue. Not sure if this is still an issue for you. I recommend you upgrade studio to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.

*Test Environments:*

CLI Version :4.1.3
Titanium SDK  Version:4.1.1.GA
Emulator :Motorola Moto X - 4.4.4 - API 19 - 720x1280
iPAD device,iOS SDK: 8.2
Appc Studio: Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126
Alloy: 1.7.6
Mac OS X,Version                     = 10.10.1.

Thanks
